summary: NASA is taking steps to return astronauts to the moon for the first time since 1972—in a mission called Artemis III. NASA and its contractors made progress since our last report on the Artemis missions, but they are still facing challenges with developing the lunar lander and space suits. For example, some flight tests have been delayed, which could affect the timing of subsequent tests...
title: NASA Artemis Programs: Crewed Moon Landing Faces Multiple Challenges
